"I'd say we have to distract those goons before they knock the 
shields out."  Wheeljack indicates Hydras's group.  "The defense grid 
has all it can handle just fending off the Preds' friends over 
there."  He points out Devilcat and Gatara, blazing away with 
repeated bursts from their weapons of choice.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> Inferno was blasting whildly away with energy blasts against the
> maximal shilds while Waspinator fired explosive stingers from his 
hand
> held weapon.
> 
> Kenzo ran to join up with with Kup and Wheeljack-X "You guys have 
any
> ideas?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Pumpskin chortles as he blazes away indiscriminately with his eye 
> > lasers.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> > >  Hydras landed and his body seemed to bolt out fire from every 
> > vein.  He shot 
> > > every weapon in his arsenal at the shields.  Proot transformed 
into 
> > Rodimus 
> > > Prime and fired several shots. Destructor followed suit. "We 
must 
> > bring these 
> > > sheilds down!" (hopefully they wont last forever)
